metaData.label: MON, TUE or FRI
metaData.criteriaDescription: Call_Day_Of_Week equal Monday OR Call_Day_Of_Week equal Tuesday OR Call_Day_Of_Week equal Friday

criteria.default_path_1: <FilterDefinition><ConditionSet Operator="OR" ConditionSetName="Individual Filter Grouping"><Condition IsEphemeralAttribute="true" Key="Event.DEAudience-f82748db-8b09-9cd4-6abc-011e6d24473e.Call_Day_Of_Week" Operator="Equal" UiMetaData="{}"><Value><![CDATA[Monday]]></Value></Condition><Condition IsEphemeralAttribute="true" Key="Event.DEAudience-f82748db-8b09-9cd4-6abc-011e6d24473e.Call_Day_Of_Week" Operator="Equal" UiMetaData="{}"><Value><![CDATA[Tuesday]]></Value></Condition><Condition IsEphemeralAttribute="true" Key="Event.DEAudience-f82748db-8b09-9cd4-6abc-011e6d24473e.Call_Day_Of_Week" Operator="Equal" UiMetaData="{}"><Value><![CDATA[Friday]]></Value></Condition></ConditionSet></FilterDefinition>
criteria.21084ccf-122e-c35a-eedf-9695c39eda13: <FilterDefinition><ConditionSet Operator="AND" ConditionSetName="Individual Filter Grouping"><Condition IsEphemeralAttribute="true" Key="Event.DEAudience-f82748db-8b09-9cd4-6abc-011e6d24473e.Call_Day_Of_Week" Operator="Equal" UiMetaData="{}"><Value><![CDATA[Thursday]]></Value></Condition></ConditionSet></FilterDefinition>
